subject: Simsonn Pro 2024 Model LC Sensor
description_text:
Hello Simsonn!

I have a set of the late 2023, early 2024 model of the Simsonn Pro Pedals.
Purchased in February 2024 from AliExpress and it appears the Load Cell
sensor on the brake pedals seems to not work right. I was wondering if
there is a replacement part number, sensor I can buy from you directly, or
any recommendation you may have to fix this as they are more than capable!
Please let me know any solutions or anything you guys can do.

Thank you!

P.S. Merry Christmas!

conversations.body_text: Hi Jaeden Lovett, Please provide your order number, and I will arrange for our AliExpress operations team to assist you in purchasing the brake pressure sensor at cost price. You donâ€™t need to worry.

Hi Jaeden Lovett, Could you please provide a screenshot of your AliExpress order page so we can verify the pedal model for you? Thank you for your cooperation.Hello, could you please provide a screenshot of your AliExpress order page so we can verify the pedal model for you? Thank you for your cooperation.
Yes! Let me know if you need anything. I do also have an updated shipping address.

Hi Jaeden Lovett, Hello, you can access the links below to upgrade your pedals with the PLUS upgrade packages: Brake Upgrade Kit 1, Three-Pedal Upgrade Kit 3.  https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005008825922603.html?spm=a2g3i.%2Fim-csp%2Fim.0.0.7e6c23f1dQ7huZ

Hello,

I need a new load cell sensor. Not upgrade parts.
I did not get help finding the real problem
I need a sensor replacement for the brake pedal.
Hi Jaeden Lovett, You can purchase brake sensors through this link; simply add a note after purchase.      https://www.aliexpress.us/item/3256810061354966.html?gatewayAdapt=glo2usa4itemAdapt
